item.title: Find Anything on Internet With Google Dorking - Google Dorking 101
item.description: We all use Google or other search engine for our daily queries and other questions over internet. And we almost get our desired results back from Google. But there might be some issues when you want to search something but you cannot get the results because that search topic is either new or does not have many public results. This problem is mostly faced by researchers where the information for the particular neeche is very limited.

item.title: Why I Think Crypto Is Halaal? Some myths about Cryptocurrencies
item.description: Cryptocurrency works on blockchain and blockchain is a decentralized system that is not governed by a country or an organization. Its circulation is limited (some exceptions) and its value may increase decrease and these tokens are mined similarly it possesses characteristics just like gold.
